articles.title: Mesut Ozil leaves Arsenal: Where did it go wrong for 'Assist King' in Premier League? - ESPN India
articles.description: Mesut Ozil's arrival at Arsenal from Real Madrid in 2013 was supposed to be the start of a new era, yet he leaves as a pariah. What happened?
articles.content:
The "Assist King" has left the building as Mesut Ozil heads to boyhood club Fenerbahce after agreeing to terminate his Arsenal contract with six months remaining.
